pyVision

pyVision Machine Learning Library

View the Project on GitHub pi19404/pyVision

  • Download ZIP File
  • Download TAR Ball
  • View On GitHub

This is website for pyVision machine learning library.

A lot of code is developed from scratch and is associated with documentation containing theoretical and algorithmic details.

The main purpose of the project is to understand the theory as well as implementation details which is typically missing in many of the OpenSource projects.

  • Jekyll A Static Website Generator

some of the documentation can be found on blog : http://pi-virtualworld@blogspot.com or PDF format documents can be found at http://scribd.com/pi19404
